name: Houndoom

passive.name: Flash Fire
passive.effect: Whenever a Fire Energy is discarded, flip a coin. If heads, generate a Fire Energy and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Dark Fire
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon to use this attack. For each Energy discarded this way, this attack deals 10 more damage.

flavor: Some say these dogs literally guard hell. Needless to say, they're not the most popular Pokemon. They do look badass tho.
